maya/beastmayaplugin/src/customattributes.cpp
/*

#include "customattributes.h"
#include <maya/MFnNumericAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MFnEnumAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MFnTypedAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MFnMessageAttribute.h>
#include <maya/MFnMatrixAttribute.h>

namespace beastmaya {

CustomAttributes::CustomAttributes() {
        addAttributeExtensions();
}

CustomAttributes::~CustomAttributes() {
        removeAttributeExtensions();
}

void CustomAttributes::addAttributeExtensions() {
        addTransformAttributes();
        addMeshAttributes();
        addLightAttributes();
}

void CustomAttributes::removeAttributeExtensions() {
        MNodeClass mnct("transform");
        MNodeClass mncm("mesh");
        MNodeClass mncl("light");
        MNodeClass mncdl("directionalLight");
        MNodeClass mncpl("pointLight");
        MNodeClass mncsl("spotLight");
        MNodeClass mncal("areaLight");

        for (size_t i=0; i<m_transformAttributes.size(); i++) {
                mnct.removeExtensionAttributeIfUnset(m_transformAttributes[i]);
        }

        for (size_t i=0; i<m_meshAttributes.size(); i++) {
                mncm.removeExtensionAttributeIfUnset(m_meshAttributes[i]);
        }

        for (size_t i=0; i<m_lightAttributes.size(); i++) {
                mncl.removeExtensionAttributeIfUnset(m_lightAttributes[i]);
        }

        for (size_t i=0; i<m_directionalLightAttributes.size(); i++) {
                mncdl.removeExtensionAttributeIfUnset(m_directionalLightAttributes[i]);
        }

        for (size_t i=0; i<m_pointLightAttributes.size(); i++) {
                mncpl.removeExtensionAttributeIfUnset(m_pointLightAttributes[i]);
        }

        for (size_t i=0; i<m_spotLightAttributes.size(); i++) {
                mncsl.removeExtensionAttributeIfUnset(m_spotLightAttributes[i]);
        }

        for (size_t i=0; i<m_areaLightAttributes.size(); i++) {
                mncal.removeExtensionAttributeIfUnset(m_areaLightAttributes[i]);
        }

}

void CustomAttributes::addTransformAttributes() {
        MNodeClass mnc("transform");
        MObject mo;
        MFnMessageAttribute mattr;
        MFnMatrixAttribute mtxattr;


        mo = mattr.create("beastInstance", "bi");
        mattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(mattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_transformAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = mattr.create("beastEntities", "be");
        mattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        mattr.setArray(true);
        mattr.setReadable(false);
        mattr.setIndexMatters(false);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(mattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                // Don't push this attribute like the others. Maya can't remove it because it's array..?
        }

        mo = mtxattr.create("beastWorldMatrix", "bwm");
        mtxattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        mtxattr.setHidden(true);
        mtxattr.setStorable(false);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(mtxattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_transformAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }
}

void CustomAttributes::addMeshAttributes() {
        MNodeClass mnc("mesh");
        MObject mo;
        MFnNumericAttribute nattr;
        MFnTypedAttribute tattr;

        mo = nattr.create("beastVisibleForGI", "bvgi", MFnNumericData::kBoolean);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(true);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_meshAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastCastGI", "bcgi", MFnNumericData::kBoolean);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(true);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_meshAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastShadowBias", "bsb", MFnNumericData::kBoolean);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(false);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_meshAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }
}

std::vector<MObject> CustomAttributes::createLightFalloffAttributes(MNodeClass& mnc) {
        MFnEnumAttribute eattr;
        MFnNumericAttribute nattr;
        MObject mo;
        std::vector<MObject> tmpObjVec;

        mo = eattr.create("beastFalloffType", "bft");
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        eattr.addField("Maya Decay", 0);
        eattr.addField("Exponent", 1);
        eattr.addField("Max Range", 2);
        eattr.addField("Polynomial", 3);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(eattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                tmpObjVec.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastFalloffRange", "bfr", MFnNumericData::kFloat);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(FLT_MAX);
        nattr.setMin(0.0f);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                tmpObjVec.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastFalloffExponent", "bfe", MFnNumericData::kFloat);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(0.0f);
        nattr.setSoftMax(10.0f);
        nattr.setMin(0.0f);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                tmpObjVec.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastFalloffClamp", "bfcl", MFnNumericData::kBoolean);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(true);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                tmpObjVec.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastFalloffConstant", "bfc", MFnNumericData::kFloat);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(1.0f);
        nattr.setSoftMax(5.0f);
        nattr.setMin(0.0f);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                tmpObjVec.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastFalloffLinear", "bfl", MFnNumericData::kFloat);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(0.0f);
        nattr.setSoftMax(5.0f);
        nattr.setMin(0.0f);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                tmpObjVec.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastFalloffQuadratic", "bfq", MFnNumericData::kFloat);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(0.0f);
        nattr.setSoftMax(5.0f);
        nattr.setMin(0.0f);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                tmpObjVec.push_back(mo);
        }

        return tmpObjVec;
}

void CustomAttributes::addLightAttributes() {
        MNodeClass mnc("light");
        MNodeClass mncdl("directionalLight");
        MNodeClass mncpl("pointLight");
        MNodeClass mncsl("spotLight");
        MNodeClass mncal("areaLight");
        MObject mo;
        std::vector<MObject> tmpObjVec;
        MFnNumericAttribute nattr;

        mo = nattr.create("beastDirectScale", "bds", MFnNumericData::kFloat);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(1.0f);
        nattr.setSoftMax(10.0f);
        nattr.setMin(0.0f);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_lightAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastIndirectScale", "bis", MFnNumericData::kFloat);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(1.0f);
        nattr.setSoftMax(10.0f);
        nattr.setMin(0.0f);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_lightAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastVisibleForReflections", "bvrl", MFnNumericData::kBoolean);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(true);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_lightAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastVisibleForRefractions", "bvrr", MFnNumericData::kBoolean);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(true);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_lightAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastVisibleForGI", "bvgi", MFnNumericData::kBoolean);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(true);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mnc.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_lightAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastPenumbraExponent", "bpe", MFnNumericData::kFloat);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(5.0f); // TODO: what is a proper default here? Match Maya somehow?
        nattr.setSoftMax(20.0f);
        nattr.setMin(0.0f);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mncsl.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_spotLightAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastNearClipDistance", "bncd", MFnNumericData::kFloat);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(0.0f);
        nattr.setMin(0.0f);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mncsl.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_spotLightAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }

        mo = nattr.create("beastFarClipDistance", "bfcd", MFnNumericData::kFloat);
        nattr.addToCategory("Beast");
        nattr.setDefault(FLT_MAX);
        nattr.setMin(0.0f);
        if(!mnc.hasAttribute(nattr.name())) {
                mncsl.addExtensionAttribute(mo);
                m_spotLightAttributes.push_back(mo);
        }

        tmpObjVec = createLightFalloffAttributes(mncpl);
        m_pointLightAttributes.insert(m_pointLightAttributes.end(), tmpObjVec.begin(), tmpObjVec.end());

        tmpObjVec = createLightFalloffAttributes(mncsl);
        m_spotLightAttributes.insert(m_spotLightAttributes.end(), tmpObjVec.begin(), tmpObjVec.end());

        tmpObjVec = createLightFalloffAttributes(mncal);
        m_areaLightAttributes.insert(m_areaLightAttributes.end(), tmpObjVec.begin(), tmpObjVec.end());
}

}
